Posted By: Rhett Yeakley
Extremely nice looking 1880's Allen & Ginter PET Cigarettes Advertising card. Printed on thick paper, with great lithography. Back is blank, very minor pencil writing, and very slight glue residue present. Great addition.  $75 shipped or best offer. 

-Rhett
